Author: undercurrents

Comment: It astounds me to this day that the government hasn't contracted an in-house software development team specifically for the creation of a proprietary and secure means of confidential communication. The fact that we can even speculate about the use of a commercial email service by the people with access to our most dangerous information should be embarrassing.
Author: Dirk_McGirken
